    • Method Detail

      • getApi

        @Nullable
public URI getApi()
        The base URL of the API the service implementation works against. All service implementation provide a default URI which will be used if this setting is NULL.

      • setApi

        public void setApi(URI api)

      • getUsername

        public String getUsername()
        The username (symbol in DataCite) to authenticate with. This determines which DOI prefix and target URL domains can be used.

      • setUsername

        public void setUsername(String username)

      • getPassword

        The password to authenticate with.
